text: Aryan Prajapati is an Indian child actor. He has had roles in television serials and Bollywood feature films.Tribune India actor meets students at Panchkula school", Chandigarh, 12th Feb 2015.Times Of India Dooooor Se Aaye Hai : Autograph dilemma for little Aryan", 27 Aug 2014. In 2020 he is playing the role of Hrithik Singh in Happu Ki Ultan Paltan. ==Filmography== ===Actor=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !!
